response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This exceptional item carries a unique value that transcends its monetary worth, offering unparalleled benefits and experiences to those who possess it. Given its extraordinary nature, I am extending an exclusive opportunity for you to acquire this masterpiece at a special introductory price of $750,000. This offer is not only a chance to own something truly remarkable but also to secure a significant investment with potential for appreciation in value over time. I look forward to the possibility of sharing this extraordinary product with you. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further.", "product_price": 750000}
